review: I find that Amazon fire was not what I expected it to be.  It is very difficult to tell what content is free and what content I would have to pay for.  You advertise that you have a ton of free content, but most of the time when I want to watch something I find out that I will be charged for it.  So I rarely use Amazon fire TV anymore.  I wish that I had not purchased it, but it is too late for a refund.
author: Jeff Moritz

review: We are really enjoying our Amazon Fire TV.There are so many choices to pick from.
author: Phillip L.

review: This is probably a good choice for streaming but I already have a good system in place. I thought this would be different but it wasn't. If you don't have anything set up it will work good.
author: Billy C. Morris

review: Good options but takes a bit of time to tee up.
author: spucky85

review: Exactly what I expected. Easy to use. Doesn't take up much space and provides easy access to  the services I wanted ie. Netflix, hulu plus, sling tv.
author: Amanda Ward

review: I like my Amazon Fire TV.  I would give it 5 stars, but it is not a seamless as I wish it was. Great buy, easy to get up and running!
author: Ted Feight
